default.headline: Work at the Speed of Thought
default.subheadline: The First Self-Governing AI Operating Layer
default.body:
Move from "Stateless Prediction" to Universal Active Inference. WorkspaceOS combines Universal Vision with a Causal World Model to give agents the context they need—and the Governance you trust.

We reject the idea that AI is just a chatbot; instead, we model work as a Teleological System—an Omniverse of entities, actions, and constraints. By grounding agents in a persistent Causal Graph, we enable true System 2 reasoning. This architecture allows our Agent Parliament to mathematically resolve conflicts and guarantee safety before execution.

bullets.desc: Passive ingestion of screen, file, and API signals into a unified Knowledge Graph. It provides agents with complete situational awareness, eliminating the need for manual context-stuffing.
rotatingDescs: Passive ingestion of screen, file, and API signals into a unified Knowledge Graph.
Sees screen, file, and API signals simultaneously.
Ingests everything into a single, queryable graph.

bullets.title: Causal World Model
bullets.desc: A persistent "System 2" architecture that maintains state across sessions. Unlike stateless LLMs, it models the *why* behind your work using Causal Graphs to enable long-horizon planning.
rotatingDescs: A persistent "System 2" architecture that maintains state across sessions.
Persistent context that survives browser refreshes.
Reasoning, not guessing, based on historical causality.

bullets.title: Agent Parliament
bullets.desc: A novel governance protocol where specialized internal agents debate every autonomous action. It mathematically resolves conflicts against your project's constraints to guarantee safety before execution.
rotatingDescs: A novel governance protocol where specialized internal agents debate every autonomous action.
Security & Quality agents verify every step.
Mathematically verified execution against constraints.

dev.headline: Your Self-Governing Engineering Partner
dev.subheadline: The active partner that refactors your code while you sleep. Governed by the Agent Parliament.
dev.body: WorkspaceOS is not just a copilot; it is a Partner that respects production safety. Using Universal Active InferenceContinuous observation of your git/terminal workflows to compile reusable automation primitives., it turns manual toil into managed assets. It utilizes system idle time to spin up Shadow EnvironmentsInvisible branches for running risky refactors or documentation passes without touching your working tree., running exhaustive tests in the background. It builds a **Hybrid Causal Graph** (Screen + API) for perfect context, all governed by an internal **Agent Parliament** that debates and verifies every commit before it's proposed.

bullets.title: Hybrid Causal Graph
bullets.desc: Fuses visual data from your IDE with ground-truth API signals. This ensures the agent never hallucinates a file state that contradicts the actual git HEAD.
rotatingDescs: Fuses visual data from your IDE with ground-truth API signals.
No more 'did you update the ticket?' checks.
Sees what you see, verifies with what it knows.

bullets.desc: Compiles your repetitive manual workflows into governed agents. The system observes your terminal history and crystallizes frequent command sequences into reusable automation.
rotatingDescs: Compiles your repetitive manual workflows into governed agents.
Turns manual tasks into system assets automatically.
Automates the 'glue code' of your job without writing scripts.

bullets.title: Verified Autonomy

rotatingDescs: The Agent Parliament debates every commit against your safety constraints.

ai.headline: The Universal World Model for AI
ai.subheadline: WorkspaceOS unifies your AI agents into a single Causal Graph that shares context across every tool.
ai.body: Your AI tools are islands—Claude doesn't know what Copilot wrote, and ChatGPT can't see your Cursor sessions. WorkspaceOS creates a **Persistent Causal World Model** across all interactions. When you debug with Copilot, your ChatGPT sessions inherit that context. When Claude writes documentation, it references the graph built in Cursor. Through **Universal Vision**, every agent shares the same ground truth. One 'System 2' reasoning loop continues across all tools, with patterns cached permanently in the graph.

bullets.title: Unified World Model
bullets.desc: A single, shared graph that allows context to flow between Claude, GPT, and Copilot. When one agent learns a fact, it is instantly available to all others.
rotatingDescs: A single, shared graph that allows context to flow between Claude, GPT, and Copilot.
Your AI agents share the same understanding of the codebase.
One unified intelligence layer for all tools.

bullets.title: Persistent State
bullets.desc: Yesterday's debugging session informs today's feature development. The system maintains a long-term memory of decisions, preventing circular conversations.
rotatingDescs: Yesterday's debugging session informs today's feature development.
Every AI remembers your project history.
Context persists across all sessions and reboots.

bullets.title: Real-time Synchronization
bullets.desc: Changes propagate across the World Model instantly. If you rename a file in VS Code, your browser-based agents see the change immediately via the OS layer.
rotatingDescs: Changes propagate across the World Model instantly.
If you rename a file, all agents know immediately.
Unified view of your work across applications.

ai.metaDescription: WorkspaceOS connects your AI agents into a unified intelligence layer that shares context across every tool. Claude, GPT, and Copilot finally work together.

vision.headline: Computing That Compiles Your Intent
vision.subheadline: WorkspaceOS transforms repeated workflows into permanent computational primitives (Entities, Actions, Constraints).
vision.body: Every workflow you repeat becomes a first-class object in the **Omniverse**. Like files and processes in traditional computing, your patterns become permanent, shareable **Teleological Primitives**. The first time you handle a payment error by checking logs, updating the dashboard, and notifying ops—that pattern is captured as a reusable **Action**. Next time, it executes instantly under the supervision of the **Agent Parliament**. Through universal screen-level awareness, these patterns work across any application, becoming the new assembly language of knowledge work.

bullets.title: Workflows as Objects
bullets.desc: Your patterns are saved as Teleological Primitives that can be edited, shared, and versioned. Automation becomes as manageable as a file on your desktop.
rotatingDescs: Your patterns are saved as Teleological Primitives.
Edit, share, and version your workflows like code.
Build complex patterns from simple ones.

bullets.title: Memory across time
bullets.desc: The system caches successful outcomes, so today's fix remembers last quarter's similar issue. Knowledge accumulates automatically in the graph, reducing organizational amnesia.
rotatingDescs: The system caches successful outcomes automatically.
Patterns evolve with your experience over time.
Knowledge accumulates in the graph, reducing amnesia.

bullets.title: Universal Compatibility
bullets.desc: Because patterns are grounded in Visual Primitives, they survive UI updates and work across any application without brittle API integrations.
rotatingDescs: Patterns use Visual Primitives, not brittle APIs.
Works on any app you can see on screen.
Future-proof automation that survives updates.
